text: Carolyn Ann Stewart (March 14, 1945 â€“ January 14, 2022)Encyclopedia of African American Actresses in Film and Television (Bob McCann)VideoHound's Golden Movie Retriever, Volume 2005 known as Carol Speed, was an American actress, singer and author.DVD Talk Speed was best known for her roles in movies during the 1970s blaxploitation era.Ebony, April 1972 She starred as Abby Williams in the 1974 blaxploitation horror movie Abby.Ebony, October 1975 She also played Lulu in The Mack. Speed was born in Bakersfield, California. Her career began in 1969 and she retired in 1989. Speed died on January 14, 2022 in Muskogee, Oklahoma at the age of 76.Echovita, Ms. Carolyn Ann Stewart Obituary (1945-2022) ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Singers from Bakersfield, California Category:Writers from Bakersfield, California Category:Actors from Bakersfield, California
title: Carol Speed
